speaker: The Fog
text: Warriors! Surely you do not hide from us! Why would you come to gain the strength of a spirit when the strength of the whole fog could be yours?

speaker: The Fog
text: The dawn of an empire is up on you, and this, tonight, is your chance to become an important individual in the making of the next age. Lay down your weapons!

speaker: Willow
text: SILENCE! I Know this lie! Such an empire will never bend to the will of its servants. Aspirants to that scale of power will only find themselves tools to it!

speaker: The Fog
text: Ha! From within you will be servants, tools? From without you will be nothing. Our power is vast far beyond the pitiful little town you hail from. We are the only future. Come, let us show you.
